resources.string: Characteristics are modified. "Test Again" enables to reiterate object accessibility test.
OCARA is born in Meylan (France) at the Orange research laboratory

OCARA, Outil de Contrôle et d’Analyse du Réel Accessible (Real word Auditing Tool), is an auditing tool for buildings accessibility. User define the path, and can check accessibility rules taking into account several kinds of impairment.
OCARA is a complete auditing tool that can adress several sets of rules, that can be personalized. It enables to test objects, paths and areas.

OCARA was developped by Orange Labs, for Orange Disability Human Ressources Mission and for Real Property Branch. Accessibility rules are based upon several legible documents and from employees needs. Other new rulesets can be added, your owns rulesets.
Orange decided to go open-source with OCARA in order to offer to every company or association the ability to check accessibility and to provide design for all, and to improve this software.
Accessibility is a well known subject that has to be taken into account in each company at least in the frame of Social responsability. This is a mainframe for well being at work.
Sharing through open source is the best way to go further.
OCARA is born in Meylan (France) at the Orange research laboratory. It was initiated by Denis Ch�ne and performed by Gilles Zanolin.

string.i: Input name or site NOIMME to audit

resources.string: Those name and version are already used for another audit
This site doesn\'t exist inside the local base
You can create a site with the + New button
Do you want to cancel all current modifications and come back to the previous screen ?
You have to select at least one appropriate rule
This path element will be removed
Do you really want to erase whole path ?
Test results:\nAccessible: All control points are checked !
Test results :\nNot accessible: Some blocking defaults remain
Test results:\nPartially accessible: Some annoying defaults remain
Test results:\nDoubt: Some accessibility points can\'t be checked
Do you really want to finalize this audit? Any change will not be possible anymore
The report is finalized and closed
It is possible to enter one or several text, photos or video comments. Just click on the related button in the upper bar

Do you really want to delete every audit comments?
Do you really want to delete every comments about this object?
